result.eng: Because of the amount of information available.
result.ga: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.orig: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.html: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.

result.eng: Half of that amount would do.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúis
result.orig: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúis
result.html: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúisHalf of that amount would do.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ leaṫ an méid sin cúisHalf of that amount would do.

result.eng: The number of university students is growing.
result.ga: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méid

result.html: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méidThe number of university students is growing.
result.ponchtml: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méidThe number of university students is growing.

result.eng: The number of applications is increasing.
result.ga: Tá líon na n-iarratas ag dul i méid
result.orig: Tá líon na n-iarratas ag dul i méid
result.html: Tá líon na n-iarratas ag dul i méidThe number of applications is increasing.
result.ponchtml: Tá líon na n-iarratas ag dul i méidThe number of applications is increasing.

result.eng: The number of complaints is increasing.

result.ponchtml: Tá líon na ngearán ag dul i méidThe number of complaints is increasing.

result.eng: Do you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ga: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.orig: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.html: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní ḃím Corrċluiċe púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.

result.eng: She is tiny and weighs nothing.
result.html: Níl méid nó meáchan intiShe is tiny and weighs nothing.
result.ponchtml: Níl méid nó meáċan intiShe is tiny and weighs nothing.
